Your servitor is eligible to receive the following supplemental magic:
Levels 1-85: Adventure - Harp Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Drum Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Guitar Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Lute Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Pipe Organ Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Horn Melody Levels 1-85: Adventure - Prevailing Sonata Levels 1-85: Adventure - Daring Sonata Levels 1-85: Adventure - Refreshing Sonata
